String configurationSectionName Returns Type Description IServiceCollection The service collection with registered TrueLayer SDK services.

api/TrueLayer.html.title: Namespace TrueLayer | TrueLayer.NET Documentation
api/TrueLayer.html.keywords: Namespace TrueLayer Classes ApiOptions Represents default options for an API resource ApiResponse Represents an API response ApiResponse<TData> Represents an API response with an expected response body Currencies Represents the currencies supported by TrueLayer CurrencyExtensions Extensions for converting amounts CustomerSegments Represents the customer segments for a provider ProblemDetails Represents a problem that occurred during the processing of a request formatted as application/problem+json as per https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7807 ReleaseChannels Represents the release stage of a provider ResourceCollection<T> Represents a collection resource SigningKey ES512 signing key used to sign API requests TrueLayerApiException Exception type for errors resulting from API operations. TrueLayerException Base class for exceptions thrown by the TrueLayer.com SDK for .NET. TrueLayerOptions Defines the options needed to configure the TrueLayer.com SDK for .NET that can be initialized using the Microsoft configuration framework. Interfaces ITrueLayerClient Provides access to TrueLayer APIs

api/TrueLayer.Payments.Model.html.title: Namespace TrueLayer.Payments.Model | TrueLayer.NET Documentation
api/TrueLayer.Payments.Model.html.keywords: Namespace TrueLayer.Payments.Model Classes AccountIdentifier Account Identifier types AccountIdentifier.Bban Defines a bank account identified by a BBAN AccountIdentifier.Iban Defines a bank account identified by an IBAN AccountIdentifier.Nrb Defines a bank account identified by a Polish NRB AccountIdentifier.SortCodeAccountNumber Defines a bank account identified by sort code and account number Beneficiary Beneficiary.ExternalAccount Represents an external beneficiary account Beneficiary.MerchantAccount Represents a TrueLayer beneficiary merchant account CreatePaymentRequest Represents a request for payment CreatePaymentResponse Create Payment Response type GetPaymentResponse Get Payment Response Types GetPaymentResponse.AuthorizationRequired Represents a payment that requires further authorization GetPaymentResponse.Authorized Represents a payment that has been authorized by the end user GetPaymentResponse.Authorizing Represents a payment that is being authorized GetPaymentResponse.Executed Represents a payment that has been executed For open loop payments this state is terminate. For closed-loop payments, wait for Settled. GetPaymentResponse.Failed Represents an authorized payment that failed to complete. This is a terminate state. GetPaymentResponse.PaymentDetails Base class containing common properties for all payment states GetPaymentResponse.Settled Represents a payment that has settled This is a terminate state for closed-loop payments. PaymentMethod Payment Method types PaymentMethod.BankTransfer Defines a payment via Bank Transfer PaymentSource Represents a payment source PaymentUser Represents an end user PaymentUserRequest Represents a payment user. PaymentUserResponse Represents an end user that has been associated with a payment. Provider Provider types Provider.UserSelected Represents provider options for 'submit provider selection' action ProviderFilter Filter options for providers ProviderFilter.ExcludesFilter

index.html.title: TrueLayer.NET | TrueLayer.NET Documentation
index.html.keywords: TrueLayer.NET Installation Using the .NET Core command-line interface (CLI) tools : dotnet add package TrueLayer.Client Using the NuGet Command Line Interface (CLI) nuget install TrueLayer.Client Using the Package Manager Console : Install-Package TrueLayer.Client From within Visual Studio: Open the Solution Explorer. Right-click on a project within your solution. Click on Manage NuGet Packages... Click on the Browse tab and search for "TrueLayer". Click on the TrueLayer package, select the appropriate version in the right-tab and click Install . Usage Prerequisites First sign up for a developer account. Follow the instructions to set up a new application and obtain your Client ID and Secret. Next, generate a signing key pair used to sign API requests. To generate a private key, run: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/out -w /out -it alpine/openssl ecparam -genkey -name secp521r1 -noout -out ec512-private-key.pem To obtain the public key, run: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/out -w /out -it alpine/openssl ec -in ec512-private-key.pem -pubout -out ec512-public-key.pem Navigate to the Payments settings section of the TrueLayer console and upload your public key. Obtain the Key Id. Configure Settings Add your Client ID, Secret and Signing Key ID to appsettings.json or any other supported configuration provider . { "TrueLayer": { "ClientId": "your id", "ClientSecret": "your secret", "UseSandbox": true, "Payments": { "SigningKey": { "KeyId": "85eeb2da-702c-4f4b-bf9a-e98af5fd47c3" } } } } Initialize TrueLayer.NET Register the TrueLayer client in Startup.cs or Program.cs (.NET 6.0): public IConfiguration Configuration { get; } public void ConfigureServices(IServiceCollection services) { services.AddTrueLayer(configuration, options => { if (options.Payments?.SigningKey != null) { // For demo purposes only. Private key should be stored securely options.Payments.SigningKey.PrivateKey = File.ReadAllText("ec512-private-key.pem"); } }); } Make a payment Inject ITrueLayerClient into your classes: public class MyService { private readonly ITrueLayerClient _client; public MyService(ITrueLayerClient client) { _client = client; } public async Task<ActionResult> MakePayment() { var paymentRequest = new CreatePaymentRequest( amountInMinor: 100, currency: Currencies.GBP, paymentMethod: new PaymentMethod.BankTransfer( new Provider.UserSelected { Filter = new ProviderFilter { ProviderIds = new[] { "mock-payments-gb-redirect" } } }, new Beneficiary.ExternalAccount( "TrueLayer", "truelayer-dotnet", new AccountIdentifier.SortCodeAccountNumber("567890", "12345678") ) ), user: new PaymentUserRequest("Jane Doe", "jane.doe@example.com", "0123456789") ); var apiResponse = await _client.Payments.CreatePayment( paymentRequest, idempotencyKey: Guid.NewGuid().ToString() ); if (!apiResponse.IsSuccessful) { return HandleFailure( apiResponse.StatusCode, // Includes details of any errors apiResponse.Problem ) } // Pass the ResourceToken to the TrueLayer Web or Mobile SDK // or, redirect to the TrueLayer Hosted Payment Page string hostedPaymentPageUrl = _client.Payments.CreateHostedPaymentPageLink( apiResponse.Data!.Id, apiResponse.Data!.ResourceToken, new Uri("https://redirect.yourdomain.com")); return Redirect(hostedPaymentPageUrl); } }
